channel.title: CVE Feed for Apple -- Apple Music for Android
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apple -- Apple Music for Android

item.title: CVE-2021-46841|2024-08-04T05:17:42.722Z -- apple -- apple%20music%20for%20android
item.description: This issue was addressed by using HTTPS when sending information over the network. This issue is fixed in Apple Music 3.5.0 for Android. An attacker in a privileged network position can track a user's activity.
